text: Zhejiang Supor Co., Ltd. or Supor () is a Chinese cookware and small appliances company, headquartered in Binjiang District, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China."Contact Us." Supor. Retrieved on May 22, 2015. It was founded in 1994. In 2006 it was the largest such company in China. That year SEB Internationale SAS, a French company, paid 2.37 billion yuan (US$296 million) to acquire Supor."Supor Cookware Confirms Takeover" (Archive). China Daily. Retrieved on May 22, 2015. It was the first Chinese cookware company to be listed on a stock market."About Us." Supor. Retrieved on May 22, 2015. title: Supor
